record.name: Exemplary Profile
record.description: A profile to be used in examples, in accordance with .

record.name: Dublin Core HTML meta data profile
record.description: A set of conventions by which a Dublin Core metadata description set can be can be represented within an (X)HTML Web page using (X)HTML elements and attributes.

record.name: Expanded JSON-LD
record.description: A profile URI to request or signal expanded JSON-LD document form.

record.name: Compacted JSON-LD
record.description: A profile URI to request or signal compacted JSON-LD document form.

record.name: Flattened JSON-LD
record.description: A profile URI to request or signal flattened JSON-LD document form.

record.name: Web Annotation
record.description: A profile URI to request or signal the document is in the Web Annotation JSON format.

record.name: RO-Crate
record.description: Profile of flattened JSON-LD that follow Research Object RO-Crate specifications.

record.name: Template for a Minimum Viable Skillset
record.description: Provides guidance on the structure and content of a Minimum Viable Skillset (MVS) Profile, to describe key skills and competences. Each MVS Profile relates the skillset for a role to the Open Science (OS) practices, activities, and outcomes that may typically be expected of the role concerned.

record.name: API catalog
record.description: A profile URI to request or signal a Linkset representing an API catalog.
